thread.section_title: CandyWarehouse.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CandyWarehouse.com | www.candywarehouse.com | 7 of 23
thread.title: Christine Stewart

author: Christine Stewart
title: Christine Stewart
text: I order candy for kids party's and wedding and the last order i got for a wedding one bag was stale and she would not let me mail it back for a new bag so I did not use a 32.00 bag of candy it was jord-almonds I was very disappointed because when ever I had a problem they took care of it and have me a new bag for the kids party I do party and kids party's and weddings and everyday party so I order my candy from a different comp.all because of a 32.00 bag Christine Stewart I will not do any more business with your comp.
